mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary(diary_no, category_no, member_no, diary_title, diary_content, diary_place, diary_thumb, diary_file, diary_size, diary_cnt, diary_rcnt ,diary_like, diary_rdate ) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(diary_no), 0) + 1 as diary_no FROM diary), #{category_no}, 1,#{diary_title}, #{diary_content}, #{diary_place}, #{diary_thumb}, #{diary_file}, #{diary_size}, #{diary_cnt}, #{diary_rcnt}, #{diary_like}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT d.diary_no, d.category_no, d.diary_title, d.diary_content, d.diary_like , d.diary_thumb, d.diary_cnt, d.diary_rcnt, d.diary_rdate, m.member_nickname FROM diary d, member m WHERE d.category_no=#{category_no} AND d.member_no = m.member_no ORDER BY d.diary_no ASC

SELECT d.diary_no, d.category_no, d.diary_title, d.diary_content, d.diary_like, d.diary_file, d.diary_cnt, d.diary_rcnt, d.diary_rdate, d.diary_place, p.pet_no, p.pet_name, p.pet_age, p.pet_weight, p.pet_gender, p.pet_kind, p.pet_image, p.pet_specific FROM diary d, pet p WHERE d.diary_no =#{diary_no} AND d.member_no = p.member_no
